SEARCH
Package com.tarjanyicsanad.domain.model

Record Class Loan

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
com.tarjanyicsanad.domain.model.Loan
Record Components:
id - the unique identifier of the loan.
book - the book being loaned.
member - the member who loaned the book.
loanedAt - the date the book was loaned.
returnDate - the date the book is expected to be returned.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public record Loan(Integer id, Book book, Member member, LocalDate loanedAt, LocalDate returnDate) extends Record implements Serializable
Represents a loan of a book to a member with details about the loan and return dates.

  • Constructor Details

    • Loan

      public Loan(Integer id, Book book, Member member, LocalDate loanedAt, LocalDate returnDate)
      Constructs a Loan record and ensures the return date is after the loan date.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the loan.
      book - the book being loaned.
      member - the member who loaned the book.
      loanedAt - the date the book was loaned.
      returnDate - the date the book is expected to be returned.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the return date is before the loan date.

  • Method Details

    • isOverdue

      public boolean isOverdue()
      Checks if the loan is overdue based on the current date.
      Returns:
      true if the loan is overdue, false otherwise.

    • isReturned

      public boolean isReturned()
      Checks if the book has been returned based on the current date.
      Returns:
      true if the book has been returned, false otherwise.

    • isLoaned

      public boolean isLoaned()
      Checks if the book is currently loaned out based on the current date.
      Returns:
      true if the book is still loaned out, false otherwise.
